title: Implement User Session Scope
description: Create a user session management system using Koin scopes.
hints: Use scope(named("userSession")) to define the scope
Use createScope() to create a new scope instance
Use scope.close() to destroy all scoped dependencies
Store the scope reference in SessionManager

testCases.description: Session should be created on login and destroyed on logout
testCases.expectedBehavior: getCurrentSession() returns data after login, null after logout
